fko.chessly.game

Interface Board

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardImpl

    public interface Board
    Interface for a Chessly board.
    Author:
    Frank Kopp (frank@familie-kopp.de)

        Returns:

        Checks if next player has a legal move - if not it is checkmate or stalemate
        Returns:

      • makeMove

        Piece makeMove(Move move)
        throws IllegalMoveException
        Makes move on board according to rules
        Parameters:
        move - Move to make on the board
        Returns:
        Piece captured or null if non captured
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - Thrown when a illegal move has been passed as parameter

      • toFEN

        java.lang.String toFEN()
        Creates a FEN based String representation of the board. Can be used to save or exchange a position.
        Returns:
        String representing the board's position as defined by FEN

      • hasSamePosition

        boolean hasSamePosition(Board b)
        Checking if the position of this board is identical to the position of the other board. This does not regard the MoveHistory (incl. no of moves) of the game. Is does regard hte next player though.
        Parameters:
        the - board to check
        Returns:
        true when the pieces are on the same fields and the next player is the same

      • getCapturedPiecesBlack

        Returns:

        Check if the move will leave the own king in check
        Parameters:
        move - to be tested
        Returns:

      • checkForFreePath

        boolean checkForFreePath(Position from,
                         Position to)
        Checks if there is another piece between the from field and the to field along the alowed move path.
        Parameters:
        fromCol - 1..8
        fromRow - 1..8
        toCol - 1..8
        toRow - 1..8
        Returns:
        true when path is free

      • checkForFreePath

        boolean checkForFreePath(Move move)
        Checks if there is another piece between the from field and the to field along the alowed move path.
        Parameters:
        move -
        Returns:
        true if no other piece blocking the way - false otherwise

      • canMoveTo

        boolean canMoveTo(Position from,
                  Position to)
        Checks if a move to a field is possible - is free or occupied by opponent. Does NOT check if pawn can capture forward! Does NOT check if the way to the field is blocked! Does NOT check if this is otherwise a legal move (e.g. King moving into Check)
        Parameters:
        fromCol - 1..8
        fromRow - 1..8
        toCol - 1..8
        toRow - 1..8
        Returns:
        true if to field is empty or occupied by opponent - false otherwise

      • isWithinBoard

        boolean isWithinBoard(Position p)
        Parameters:
        col - 1..8
        row - 1..8
        Returns:
        true if still on valid board fields
